laboratory_examinations.findings: Multiple electroencephalogram evaluations showed inconsistent findings. There were no clear ictal patterns on EEG.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Multiple EEG evaluations continued to show inconsistent findings over several years.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Frequent abnormalities identified in the left frontal and temporal lobes, specifically showing a left temporal lobe slow wave focus.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Multiple MRI evaluations over years showed inconsistent findings.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Not explicitly detailed in the report.
Inconsistent findings with abnormalities identified in the left frontal and temporal lobes.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Repeated PET evaluations showed inconsistent findings.
